remarks: Lemma for ~ ablfac1b .  Satisfy the assumptions of ablfacrp. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
statement:
ablfac1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ablfac1.o $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
ablfac1.s $e |- S = ( p e. A |-> { x e. B | ( O ` x ) || ( p ^ ( p pCnt ( # ` B ) ) ) } ) $.
ablfac1.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
ablfac1.f $e |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) $.
ablfac1.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ Prime ) $.
ablfac1.m $e |- M = ( P ^ ( P pCnt ( # ` B ) ) ) $.
ablfac1.n $e |- N = ( ( # ` B ) / M ) $.
ablfac1lem $p |- ( ( ph /\ P e. A ) -> ( ( M e. NN /\ N e. NN ) /\ ( M gcd N ) = 1 /\ ( # ` B ) = ( M x. N ) ) ) $.
$d A p x $.
$d B p x $.
$d G p x $.
$d O p x $.
$d P p x $.
$d p ph x $.
